definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: They’re a sign of hope that Monrovia may once again be bustling and prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 它們是蒙羅維亞再次繁榮興旺的希望之光。

sentences.english: Bullet casings cover entirely a street in Monrovia.
sentences.chinese: 在蒙羅維亞，子彈殼鋪滿了整個街區。
